text: Ariano may refer to: ==Places== * Ariano Irpino, Campania, Italy * Ariano nel Polesine, Veneto, Italy * , Mesola, Emilia-Romagna, Italy * Ariano, Olevano sul Tusciano, Campania, Italy ==People== * Ariano Fernandes (born 1963), Brazilian politician * Ariano Suassuna (1927–2014), Brazilian playwright * Azmahar Ariano (born 1991), Panamanian footballer ==See also== * * Assizes of Ariano, a 12th-century constitution for the Kingdom of Sicily
title: Ariano
